Package dev.prozilla.pine.common.lifecycle

package dev.prozilla.pine.common.lifecycle
Defines the lifecycle stages for various objects. Stages of the lifecycle occur in the following order:
  • Before lifetime:
    1. Initialization
  • During lifetime, once per frame:
    1. Input handling
    2. Updating
    3. Rendering
  • After lifetime:
    1. Destruction
  • Related Packages
    Package

    dev.prozilla.pine.common
    Contains abstract utilities that are agnostic to Pine.
